action.description: The committee on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Lamosao, Ichiyama, Iwamoto, Morikawa, Poepoe, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Belatti, Souza;  Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Woodson.
